description:
If you have been injured in a motor vehicle accident that was the result of someone else's negligence, you are entitled to recover full compensation for your medical bills, lost wages and any other losses. From our office in Cumming, Georgia, David M. Van Sant of Van Sant Law, LLC, has the expertise and experience in personal injury law to recover the full compensation you deserve.

Mr. Van Sant understands how quickly your life can be turned upside down as the result of an injury to you or a loved one. While you're recuperating and helping to put the pieces of your life back together, Van Sant Law can assess your case and coordinate the legal filings necessary to help you recover full compensation from all responsible parties involved in your accident.

Mr. Van Sant previously worked as a defense attorney for a large insurance company. His insider knowledge of the strategies used most often by insurance companies benefits his clients as he advocates on their behalf for a fair and full settlement. He often reaches an agreement without going to trial, but he is always fully prepared to argue a case in court if a fair settlement cannot be reached.

Van Sant Law, LLC represents individuals throughout Georgia in all types of personal injury accident and wrongful death cases, including:

Car accidents Truck accidents
Motorcycle accidents
Boat and other watercraft accidents
Automobile product liability
Worksite accidents
Pedestrian accidents
Medical malpractice

Mr. Van Sant tailors his services around your needs. He is happy to meet with you in any of four office locations in Georgia, or he will come to your home or a hospital. He will review the circumstances of your case and give you an honest assessment of what you can expect in terms of restoration of damages. Call 770-886-9199 today to schedule a free initial consultation.
